channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for WA

item.title: Report E-2024100195
item.description:
Report E-2024100195

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-09T09:22:30+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-09-10
  • City: SPOKANE
  • State: WA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: At 1430ET, XPO notified ERTS of a cargo release of approximately 2 quarts of ultra concentrate ultra presoak 222 was released from a plastic jug due to improper loading. The release impacted inside trailer#319-1127. Sandy informed us that this was already cleaned up and placed into an 8-gallon metal drum with just the product and plastic jug. 217271-1 8-gallon poly drum product and plastic jug was staged for terminal personnel to manage.
